version_description:
We’re overJOYED for this new update!

NEW MAP!
Play new levels on the fabulous Rainbow Dream map!

NEW OBSTACLE!
Create Multi-Colour Memories and see the power behind two Emotions working together!

AUTUMN’S ANGER-FEST
Enjoy the last days of Autumn before this event falls away!

KEEP AN EYE OUT FOR NEW GAME EVENTS!

Ring in the New Year with this update!

NEW MAP!
Explore NEW levels on Science Island!

NEW OBSTACLE!
Don't get stuck with these Mental Blocks! Make same-colored matches to clear them out of the way!

Roses are red, violets are blue, Valentine's Day is here…EW!!

NEW EVENT!
Channel your inner Disgust in this new Event!

NEW MAP!
No need to get dramatic, but Tragic Vampire Romance Island is opening up soon!
Bug fixes and optimizations

All aboard the Train of Thought in this NEW update!

NEW MECHANIC!
Grab an extra Memory with the new Imaginary Bag Mechanic!

NEW LEVELS!
Travel to the Train Yard to enjoy NEW levels!

NEW EVENT!
Let the orbs pour down in the new April Showers Event!

Jump for joy over this huge, fun-filled update!

NEW CHALLENGE EVENTS!
Beat all the challenge levels with just 1 life & win awesome prizes in our newest event!

NEW 3D TOUCH!
Get back in the game faster with just one touch!

NEW MAP & LEVELS!
Exciting new levels are just a hop, skip and a jump away on the new Classroom Dream map!

We can hardly contain our emotions with this newest update!

UNLOCK NEW PRIZE CHESTS!
Play to unlock bronze, silver, and gold chests filled with ever increasing rewards!

NEW LEVELS ALWAYS IN STYLE!
Be on trend this season and play new levels on Fashion Island!
Bug fixes and optimizations.

We can hardly contain our joy with this newest update!

GET AROUND THE TRIPLE DENT GUM ORB!
Try and get this challenging new obstacle out of your head, and out of your way!

NEW LEVELS THAT WILL STICK WITH YOU!
Play all the unforgettable new levels in Long Term Memory!
Minor bug fixes and optimized performance.
Minor bug fixes and optimized performance.
Minor bug fixes and optimized performance.

We’re overflowing with joy to announce our newest update!

BEWARE OF SCATTERED THOUGHTS!
Stay focused on your matches or you might suffer from Scattered Thoughts!

NEW LEVELS THAT WILL GIVE YOU A FRIGHT!
Play the scary good new levels in Nightmare Productions!
Minor bug fixes and optimized performance.

FRIENDLY TIMES AWAIT YOU!
Get acquainted with our new levels on Friendship Island!

MORE MEMORABLE MOMENTS!
Waiting for your lives to refill? Find even more fun by tapping the video button on the map to enjoy a ton of must-see videos & trailers from the world of Disney.
Minor bug fixes and optimized performance.

HAVE A FEAST WITH OUR NEW LEVELS!
Set your sights on our new levels on Food Island!

Minor bug fixes and optimized performance.
Minor bug fixes and optimized performance.

GET ACQUAINTED WITH OUR NEW LEVELS!
Spend some quality time with our new levels on Family Island!

Minor bug fixes and optimized performance.

NEW LEVELS THAT WILL EXCITE YOUR THOUGHTS!
Spend some quality time with our new levels on Abstract Thought Island!

Minor bug fixes and optimized performance.

NEW LEVELS THAT WILL GET YOU ENERGIZED!
Skate to victory with our new levels on Hockey Island!
Minor bug fixes and optimized performance.
